segments.text: I have to get to Chicago by tomorrow and you're telling me that there are no flights ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm very sorry , sir . I could put you on a waiting list , but you would be wise to check out other means of travel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean like a bus ? Have you ever traveled for ten hours on a bus before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have not sir . But I do have a number for a very comfortable bus that goes to Chicago every hour from here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright , give me the number . But put me on that waiting list as well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is the number , and your name is on the waiting list .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many people are on the waiting list right now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right now I show that there are 176 people on the list . And you are number 176 .
segments.speaker: S2
